website_summaries.verdict: Cleaning supplies will meet expectations and even repair scratches, all from a trusted brand.
pros: 10-piece kit makes it easy to detail your vehicle
Odor-X Odor Eliminator & Refresher Spray destroys odors
Efficient products do more in less steps
Reviewers especially appreciate the products' smell
cons: If you're looking for high shine, this is probably not your product

website_summaries.verdict: A complete car wash kit from a trusted brand that includes interior cleaners, odor eliminators and other top-of-the-line car wash products.
pros: Includes an odor eliminator and refresher spray that destroys odors at the molecular level for up to 30 days
Fast-drying tire shine formula protects against harmful UV rays
Offers an excellent kit for professionals or those who are new to detailing
cons: Interior cleaner and tire cleaner may deliver minimal shine in comparison to other car wash kit products

customer_reviews.title: Nice detailing bundle
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today, it came three days after ordering like it said. It was packaged well double boxed with plenty of bubble wrap. No leakage or damage which I was afraid of due to other reviews. I received one of everything in the bundle and will update my review on how well each product works. I took pictures of what I received and my silly cat kept trying to steal things. I guess he likes the microfiber sponge...
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to have a great looking car as long as you give it the time and effort. Oh and at least 4 microfiber towels would help too lol. I have bought a few car cleaning kits and this one is by far the best chemicals and best variety. everything you need for inside and out unless you have leather seats. Good value, 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Garett

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/Leaked, Not Eligible For Returns Or Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I could smell the product from outside the box. And when I opened it I saw the box was wet because a couple of the bottles had opened up and leaked all over everything. In face the ZIPwax wasn’t even sealed under the cap like it should have been, so about 1/4 of the bottle spilled out. Don’t buy this because it’s NOT eligible for return or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Wash and waxed my car several weeks ago, and the rain still beads on my car. Interior cleaner leaves a long-lasting shine. The tires aren’t as shiny, but they looked new the first week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad kit
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad kit just wish the interior cleaner would shine dash a little more. But will serve its purpose
customer_reviews.author: elsie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good Turtle Wax produsts to try at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This carwashing kit contained old favorites and some products my husband had not tried. Keeping cars clean in the Midwest in the winter is always a challenge-just trying to help him out because I appreciate his efforts!
customer_reviews.author: nicnatmom2

customer_reviews.title: What a treat
customer_reviews.text: This kit has it all! And these are not some small sized containers. I really like that there were a few products I had not tried in the past. It gave me an opportunity to try some new products without spending a ton of money. This kit is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: skm526

customer_reviews.title: Good selection of Auto Cleaners/ Protectants
customer_reviews.text: Turtle wax makes a good product and this is no different. I bought this as I try to keep my vehicles clean and neat and it works really well with the good assortment of items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bought to let for my husband's for Valentine's. Just got warm enough to start using, so is too late to return. I've used this brand many times in the past, but everyone of these products is junk! None of it works and the soap actually left spots on my less than week old new car and my husband's truck, that literally had to be scrubbed off. Wax and tire shine like using water. Please don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Tony Owen

customer_reviews.title: Save money and have your car shining
customer_reviews.text: Great kit!! I look it I saved so much money on washing the car this summer
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A steal for $30. Though the tire shine, it’s not as shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Shehzad Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Spray Wax and Soap are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love the car wash (although wish the suds lasted longer), love the dash cleaner (but does NOT CLEAN GLASS WELL) and absolutely love the Spray Wax. Everything else didn’t work as well as expected. But still a good value for everything. Good for a beginner car cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Alex E

customer_reviews.title: Great, do NOT use Scratch Remover
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 stars but the scratch remover does not work well. It puts bigger scratches on my car rather than remove them, or make the scratches bigger. Great for gifts, even better for your car!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Tech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. Had a leak on first delivery from one of the bottles. Let the seller know and they replaced the entire kit with no hassle allowing me to salvage what was still good from the original delivery. Maybe a little biased rating because in the end I made out, but the product has done me really well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT gift for the man in your life who LOVES Cars!
customer_reviews.text: A good assortment of car cleaning stuff. Lots of different products for making the car shine. A GREAT gift for the man in your life who loves cars. He'll thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Replace a bottle inside kit?
customer_reviews.text: Great products but was not able to use the tire shine spray. The liquid was all over the towels and the other sprays. That’s the only complaint about this. But the wax and wash, including the wax and dry. Left my car spotless and looking new. I have plastic trimmings which was getting faded but after using the plastic cleaner it left the trims brand new. I really wish I was able to use the tire spray or if I’d have to send the entire package back. Or repurchase it?
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Great Girt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas to use on his classic car. And he wouldn't use anything less than awesome on that car of his. :)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for someone that just bought a new car
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new car, and want to keep it clean. We Bought this set because it has everything you need. We think this would be perfect gift for first time car owner.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: Products great. Just needs to be sealed better
customer_reviews.text: Products work great! Unfortunately I received it and the box inside was damp and wet from leakage on tire shine spray. It was on all the bottles . But besides that I do like the product. I wish I could get another tire spray for free since this one leaked but still working.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Gatan

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived with an empty bottle because the product had leaked all over! I tried to return it and turns out they won't accept returns. Waste of money!!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Window stuff was leaked out all over. Scratch remover didnt work that well. Definitely didnt do well on swirls tire shine doesnt last 2 hours. Wax leaves streaks no matter how well you buff it

customer_reviews.text: It didnt really do as much as i had hoped for my motorcycle. The waxes didnt fill any micro cuts and they didnt polish as much as i wanted but after there was a slight gloss and a close to simular mirror like polish but not the best

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!

Needless to say I felt like Brazil when they lost 1-7 to the Third Reich. Concerned I contacted amazon customer services and tried to get my bottle replaced, to which they replied that they couldn’t, instead they would send an entirely new kit, the moment I read that I felt like The third Reich when they beat Brazil 7-1. GG great product thanks! 🙏🏿

product_meta.title: Turtle Wax 50754 Ultimate Car Care Kit
product_meta.description: Style:Ultimate Car Care KitWhether you're a professional or new to detailing, the Ultimate Turtle Wax Car Care Kit has everything you need to clean, shine, and protect your car inside and out. Turtle Wax has combined its best-selling innovation into one convenient 10-piece kit. The Ultimate Turtle Wax Car Care Kit makes washing and detailing a car easy. The kit includes Quick & Easy Zip Wax Car Wash & Wax to clean and wax a car simultaneously with a foaming car wash. The Quick & Easy line's most popular selling wax, Wax & Dry that allows you to wax your car before drying it. Wet'N Black Ultra Wet Tire Shine and Quick & Easy Inside & Out Protectant both have every inch of your car covered inside and out when it comes to shine and protection. Turtle Wax Scratch & Swirl remover safely eliminates imperfections and blemishes all over paint. Take care of your car's interior with Quick & Easy Dash & Glass and Odor-X Odor Eliminator & Refresher. Dash & Glass with make dashboards, windows, tech screens, and more shine while Odor-X eliminates odors at the molecular level. The Ultimate Turtle Wax Car Care Kit provides the ultimate shine inside and out.
feature_bullets: 10-Piece Complete Car Kit includes Car Wash, Tire Shine, Odor-X Spray, Scratch & Swirl Remover, Wax & Dry Spray Wax
Ultimate Car Care Kit makes for convenient detailing and easy application, including everything you need from wash and protectants to interior cleaners and odor eliminators
Four innovative products from Quick & Easy line perform more tasks in less steps - wash, wax, shine, and protect in less time
Odor-X Odor Eliminator & Refresher Spray is formulated with exclusive Odor-X technology to destroy odors at the molecular level for up to 30 days
Turtle Wax Wet'N Black Ultra Wet Tire Shine's fast-drying formula protects against harmful UV rays and provides high shine with a more wet-look shine and no sling

specifications.Cover Included: Zip Wax Wash 16oz., Wet'N Black Tire Shine 26oz., Odor-X Travel Spray 2oz. Pump, Scratch & Swirl Remover 11oz., Wax & Dry Spray Wax 26oz., Dash & Glass 23oz., Inside & Out Protectant 10.4oz., 2 Microfiber Towels, 1 Foam Applicator
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars738 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
